title: REC sanctions record Rs 3.59 lakh crore loan in FY24
description: REC sanctioned record Rs 3.59 lakh crore loans in 2023-24, focusing on renewable energy. Its loan book reached Rs 5.09 lakh crore by March 31, 2024, with a significant increase in loan disbursements.
